evidence.claim: Nota utilizes AWS cloud infrastructure for hosting and data processing.
The company implements RESTful APIs for seamless integration with healthcare systems.
Nota supports FHIR standards to ensure interoperability with health systems.
Webhook integration enables real-time data updates and notifications in the platform.
PostgreSQL is used as the primary database for handling structured health data.

icp.icp_reason: No evidence found of X12 transactions or clearinghouse services.
